metadata.dc:author: Quiroz, L
metadata.dc:description: In aesthetic odontology with adhesive materials, a close liaison between manufacturers and dentists is a much-needed prerequisite. Now more than in the past, when restorations were done on nobler materials, techniques and procedures involving composite materials must be performed with extreme precision, since such techniques are very sensitive.
metadata.dc:title: Odontología estética, su concepción actual.
[Current status of esthetic dentistry].
